title: 'Mudbound' brings new names and faces to the Oscars
text:
'Mudbound' brings new names and faces to the Oscars 3:41am GMT - 01:12 
While period race drama ''Mudbound'' may have been left out of the big categories of best picture and director, it has brought new faces to the Oscar race. Rough Cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
While period race drama "Mudbound" may have been left out of the big categories of best picture and director, it has brought new faces to the Oscar race.
